attributes.description: Dashboard focused on detecting cryptocurrency mining activity in GKE clusters. Monitors Stratum protocol connections, mining pool DNS queries, high CPU processes, and known miner binary execution. Designed to detect APT-deployed crypto miners (T1496 - Resource Hijacking).
